Player History
Drafted in 16th round, 254th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/23/2015, off Lamont Pizano (CHI)...
Earned first career win on 8/2/2015...

Injured on 7/23/2016 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
